note: GDP per capita is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices.
title: Carbon emission intensity vs. GDP per capita
subtitle: Carbon emission intensity is measured in kilograms of COâ‚‚ per dollar of GDP.  Emissions from [fossil fuels and industry](#dod:fossilemissions) are included, but [land-use change emissions](#dod:land-use-change-emissions) are not. GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries.
